T02D1622:179b-6: de yi ji ltar 'byor pa bya //
T02D1622:179b-7: gsang pa las ni bza' bar bya //
T02D1622:179b-8: dngos po yin te gzhan ma yin //
T02D1622:179b-9: ci ltar bza' zhes gal te bza' //
T02D1622:179b-10: thams cad rnal 'byor ma nyid yin /
T02D1622:179b-11: rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1622:179b-12: thams cad rnal 'byor ma dbyangs kyis //
T02D1622:179b-13: de dag yi ge bcu drug ste //
T02D1622:179b-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1622:179b-15: lus bzhi dam tshig bzhi ni bsam //
T02D1622:179b-16: kha sbyor bzhi yis rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1622:179b-17: pa ha ra bzhi rnam par bsam //
T02D1622:179b-18: grub pa po mchog nyid kyis ni //
T02D1622:179b-19: ji ltar dus bzhi byin gyis brlab //
T02D1622:179b-20: lha yi 'khor lo rnam pa rnams //
T02D1622:179b-21: ji ltar de nyid rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1622:179b-22: gang gis bkur stis rnal 'byor grub //
T02D1622:179b-23: 'di yi grub ces gal te bzlas //
T02D1622:179b-24: thams cad rgyan ni yang dag tshang //
T02D1622:179b-26: de ltar rnal 'byor mchog gi mchog / de phyir gzhan grub grub pa ci //
T02D1622:179b-27: nor tshogs grub ces bzlas pas ni //
T02D1622:179b-28: nges par grub pa ma lus thon //
T02D1622:179b-29: sku gsum smon lam sbyin pa po //
T02D1622:179b-30: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02D1622:179b-31: sku gsum grub pa thob dang ldan //
T02D1622:179b-32: nor gyi tshogs kyi goms pa po //
T02D1622:179b-33: yang de ltar ni thob ces bstan //
T02D1622:179b-34: ji lte 'gyur zhes gal te bzlas //
T02D1622:179b-35: dbang po gnyis kyis rab tu sbyor //
T02D1622:179b-36: dbang po gnyis kyis rab sbyor bas //
T02D1622:179b-37: las byung sku gsum grub pa nyid //
T02D1622:179b-38: nor tshogs dbang po gnyis las byung //
T02D1622:179b-39: mi shigs pa yi phyir 'di nyid //
T02D1622:179b-40: 'di ltar sku gsung grub pa bstan //
T02D1622:179b-41: bla med de nyid grub par bstan //
T02D1622:179b-42: 'di ni dam pa ci yod don //
T02D1622:179b-43: de nas rgyud 'di las ni bstan //
T02D1622:179b-44: ma lus bstan pa so sor bstan //
T02D1622:179b-45: de nyid dag ni gsal bar bshad //
T02D1622:179b-46: don min grub pa po nyid go //
T02D1622:179b-47: 'di la bstan pa'i grub pa rnams //
T02D1622:179b-48: 'grub par bya zhes go byas bshad //
T02D1622:179b-50: tshigs su bcad rnams tshigs su bcad //
T02D1622:179b-51: phyed kyang tshigs su bcad pa ste //
T02D1622:179b-52: de nas gong bu don gyis snyan //
T02D1622:180a-1: rab tu ni brtag pa po //
T02D1622:180a-2: tshigs su bcad pa gal te bzla //
T02D1622:180a-3: gzugs rnams dang ni phyag rgya rnams //
T02D1622:180a-4: mtshan ma rnams la de bzhin du //
T02D1622:180a-5: gzugs rnams la ni dbyibs rnams te /
T02D1622:180a-6: lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs rnams nyid //
T02D1622:180a-7: phyag rgya rnams la zhes bya gang //
T02D1622:180a-8: phyag rgya dbu rgyan la ni rigs //
T02D1622:180a-9: de dag bdag po bzhag pa ste //
T02D1622:180a-10: mtshan ma rnams kyis phyag mtshan mtshon //
T02D1622:180a-11: de dag gzugs la sogs pa yin //
T02D1622:180a-12: dbang bskur yan chad yan lag bzhi //
T02D1622:180a-14: dam tshig bcu rnams bsam gtan te //
T02D1622:180a-15: de nyid nor ni 'bar byed dang ;
T02D1622:180a-16: / srog byed de nyid sdom pa ste //
T02D1622:180a-17: ril bu dngos grub rnams ni de //
T02D1622:180a-18: thabs ni sna tshogs ma lus bstan //
T02D1622:180a-20: sngags kyis bkod pa'i phrin las nyid //
T02D1622:180a-21: ri lu rab tu grub la sogs //
T02D1622:180a-23: lha mo sgrub thabs sogs yid 'od //
T02D1622:180a-24: de dag rab tu bstan pa ste /
T02D1622:180a-25: lha mo yid mgyogs rnam par bstan //
T02D1622:180a-28: 'chang byed klog byed bsam byed de //
T02D1622:180a-30: de nyid rnal 'byor dbang phyag ma //
T02D1622:180a-31: rtag tu kun du bsrung bar 'gyur //
T02D1622:180a-32: rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma nyid ni ;
T02D1622:180a-33: / rdzu 'phrul chen po bsrung ba'i don //
T02D1622:180a-34: sgrub 'phrul chen mo mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud rnam par bstan pa'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so /
T02D1622:180a-36: // / sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud la rdo rje slob
T02D1622:180a-37: dpon mkhas pa dpal du dza ya tsandras sgyu 'phrul
T02D1622:180a-38: dang ldan ba'i 'grel pa byas pa rdzogs so //
T02D1622:180a-39: gti mug mun pas ldongs rnams la //
T02D1622:180a-41: dge ba 'dod rnams cis ni mdo //
T02D1622:180a-42: 'grel pa sgyu ma can la dga' //
T02D1622:180a-43: rje yi mnga' ris mdo smad dbyar mo thang //
T02D1622:180a-44: rdo rje rin chen gling btsun dben gnas su //
T02D1622:180a-45: ye shes sems dpas mos pa'i dad pas zhus //
T02D1622:180a-46: bde bar gshegs pa'i grags pas thugs rjes gnang //
T02D1622:180a-47: lung rigs dang mi 'gal bar bsgyur ba rdzogs so //
T02D1622:180a-48: 'grel pa dang ldan rgyud nyid de //
T02D1622:180a-49: bsgyur ba mar me 'dra byas la //
T02D1622:180a-50: mkhan po bde gshegs grags pa yis //
T02D1622:180a-51: ri rab lta bu'i dge rtsa 'des //
T02D1622:180a-52: sems can nyon mongs mes bsregs rnams /
